name: Hello Green Click by Green Aureus
author: Green Aureus

sections.description:
Hello Green Click is an e-commerce plugin by Green Aureus aimed at transforming climate protection into business growth, enabling online shop operators to offer their customers a sustainable shopping experience.

Functionality

Shop operators can set a percentage of the sales price for CO₂ credits, and customers can round up their invoice amount to offset their ecological footprint.

Sustainability Proof
A blockchain-based solution provides verifiable information on sustainability efforts.

Key Features
– Competitive Advantage and Revenue Increase: Boosts revenue through sustainable strategies.
– Trust Building and Customer Loyalty: Strengthens trust and loyalty of customers through transparency.
– Improvement of Repeat Purchase Rates: Increases repeat purchase rates by providing options to reduce the ecological footprint.

The Hello Green Click e-commerce plugin is an innovative tool that supports online shops in decarbonization and promotes business growth through the inclusion of climate protection measures.

Prerequisite

WooCommerce

Third-Party Service Disclosure

This plugin relies on a third-party service Hello Green Click for handling CO₂ offset data and messages. The plugin makes external API calls to the following endpoints:

  1. https://dashboard.hellogreenclick.com/api/place_order – to place an order for CO₂ offsets.
  2. https://dashboard.hellogreenclick.com/api/messages/info – to retrieve informational messages.
  3. https://dashboard.hellogreenclick.com/api/settings – to retrieve settings for the plugin.

For more information about Hello Green Click, please visit:
– Website
– Guide
– Terms of Service
– Privacy Policy
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/hello-green-click directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the WooCommerce settings page to configure the plugin.

short_description: Integrate climate action in your store, boost sales, and build customer trust with CO₂ credits.
